description: Sample Looker Studio dashboard template for Kevlar
notes:
This file serves as a starting point for visualizing Kevlar data in Looker Studio.

It defines a few example charts you can import into Looker Studio and bind to your BigQuery dataset. To use it, replace the dataset placeholders with your own project, dataset and table names.

For more information on creating reports, see: https://support.google.com/looker-studio/answer/9053465

charts.title: KEV Matches by Application
charts.sql: SELECT Application_Title, COUNT(*) AS match_count FROM `PROJECT_ID.DATASET.app_matches` GROUP BY Application_Title ORDER BY match_count DESC LIMIT 10

charts.title: Endpoint Counts Over Time
charts.sql: SELECT DATE(_processed_at) AS date, COUNT(DISTINCT Computer_Name) AS endpoints FROM `PROJECT_ID.DATASET.app_matches` GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

charts.title: Recent KEV Matches
charts.sql: SELECT Computer_Name, Application_Title, _Application_Version, cve_id, patched_version FROM `PROJECT_ID.DATASET.app_matches` ORDER BY _processed_at DESC LIMIT 25
